nodes.text: Between 3 ABY and 4 ABY, an Imperial Garrison was stationed on Vandor. After encountering Luke Skywalker, Chewbacca, and C-3PO on the moon Nar Shaddaa, a human member of the Kanji Criminal Enterprise suggested informing the garrison that Skywalker was a Jedi, feeling the Kanji would be paid for the information.
